House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02084
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING SECTIONS 4, 5, 20, 22, 25, 27, 28, 34, 40, 50, 73, 112, 117, 119, 203, 204, 222, 237, 237-A, 255, 256, 257, 258, 260, 261, 262, 263, 264, 265, 266, 275, 282, 290 AND ADDING SECTIONS 6-A AND A NEW TITLE XIII UNDER THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OF 1997, AS AMENDED, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Seeks to lower the corporate income tax rate, reform the corporate income tax system, and broaden the tax base by modernizing investment tax incentives to enhance fairness, improve competitiveness, plug tax leakages, and achieve fiscal sustainability. Endeavors to address several major policy issues as regards to: a) corporate income tax rate and tax base; b) investment tax incentive system; c) transfer pricing and other anti-avoidance practices; and d) role of the Department of Finance minister re: grant of tax incentives.
